implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Main UI component for managing todos. Handles listing, creating, editing, and deleting todos by invoking API methods and rendering todo fields (title, description, notes, expiry_date).
implementation.name: App
implementation.pseudo_code:
On mount:
  Call todoApi.list() to fetch todos
  Display todos in a list
  For each todo:
    Show title, description, notes, expiry_date
    Provide edit and delete buttons
  On 'New todo' button:
    Show TodoForm for creation
  On edit:
    Show TodoForm with existing values
  On delete:
    Confirm and call todoApi.delete(id)

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: UI form for creating and updating todos. Enforces required title, collects description, notes, and expiry_date, and passes data to parent handlers.
implementation.name: TodoForm
implementation.pseudo_code:
Render form fields:
  Input for title (required)
  Textarea for description
  Textarea for notes
  Date input for expiry_date
On submit:
  IF title is empty
    Show error
  ELSE
    Call onSave with form data

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Provides frontend API methods for CRUD operations. Each method corresponds to a backend endpoint for todos.
implementation.name: todoApi (list, get, create, update, delete)
implementation.pseudo_code:
list():
  Send GET request to /todos
get(id):
  Send GET request to /todos/{id}
create(data):
  Send POST request to /todos with data
update(id, data):
  Send PUT request to /todos/{id} with data
delete(id):
  Send DELETE request to /todos/{id}

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Backend endpoint for listing all todos. Returns todos with all specified fields.
implementation.name: /todos (GET)
implementation.pseudo_code:
On GET /todos:
  Open DB cursor
  Execute SQL to select all todos
  For each row:
    Convert to Todo object
  Return list of todos

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Backend endpoint for retrieving a single todo by ID. Returns all fields.
implementation.name: /todos/{todo_id} (GET)
implementation.pseudo_code:
On GET /todos/{todo_id}:
  Open DB cursor
  Execute SQL to select todo by id
  IF not found
    Raise 404
  ELSE
    Convert to Todo object
    Return todo

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Backend endpoint for creating a new todo. Requires title, accepts description, notes, expiry_date.
implementation.name: /todos (POST)
implementation.pseudo_code:
On POST /todos with TodoCreate:
  Open DB cursor
  Insert todo into DB with title, description, notes, expiry_date
  Get inserted row id
  Return created todo

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Backend endpoint for updating an existing todo. Accepts partial updates for all fields.
implementation.name: /todos/{todo_id} (PUT)
implementation.pseudo_code:
On PUT /todos/{todo_id} with TodoUpdate:
  Open DB cursor
  Check if todo exists
  IF not found
    Raise 404
  ELSE
    Build update SQL for provided fields
    Execute update
    Return updated todo

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Backend endpoint for deleting a todo by ID.
implementation.name: /todos/{todo_id} (DELETE)
implementation.pseudo_code:
On DELETE /todos/{todo_id}:
  Open DB cursor
  Execute SQL to delete todo by id
  IF not found
    Raise 404
  ELSE
    Return None
